messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4539
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there, I am Suzan with a Z, wife to beloved husband Steve & happy mommy to my blessings; sweet girl Cassia 94, beany boy Benjamin 97,  totkins Aaron
messages.messageBody:
Hi there, I am
Suzan with a Z, wife to beloved husband Steve & happy mommy to my blessings;
"sweet girl" Cassia '94, "beany boy" Benjamin '97, "totkins" Aaron 2K.
I usually lurk and read a lot, because I don't have much time to talk alot.
I live in North Las vegas, down a couple of miles from Elissa Wahl. We are
in a couple of homeschool groups together. One is Christain and the other
is Inclusive. The people are just peolple. We all have our quirks and
oddities. Some of the not so "christian" people are nicer as people, but
it's more of a homeschooler thing than anything else, and the church that we
go to and is the sponsor of one of our groups is considdered by some people
to be oh so liberal. At least that's what I heard.
As for me I couldn't homeschool the way I do; lax, un, relaxed, delight
directed, whatever with out the support of God, my friends, and groups like
this. No matter who you might think you are a blessing from, you are still
a blessing to me.
Come visit us in Sin City (Las Vegas) some time.

Suzan with a Z, wife to beloved husband Steve & happy mommy to my blessings;
"sweet girl" Cassia '94, "beany boy" Benjamin '97, "totkins" Aaron 2K.
